description: Dore ibiganiro tuzumva muri iki cyumweru kuri radio
title: TUZUMVA IKI?
content: Mu kiganiro cyo ku wa Gatatu, tuzumva uburyo umuntu ashobora kororera ahantu hato, by umwihariko ubworozi bw inzuki. Na ho kuwa Gatanu, tuzumva uburyo ababyeyi benshi bemera ko gufasha umukobwa kwiteza imbere no kumenya ubushobozi bwe akanabukoresha, bituma igihugu cyose gitera imbere. Bizaba bishyushye, hazaba harimo n utundi tuntu tw ubwenge!
